name: 奈米科學與技術導論
goals: Learn about the history of nanoscience
Understand important physics topics and tendency
Familiar with the development focus of nanomaterials
syllabus:
1: Introduction: The Incipient of Nanoscience/technology; The Scope and Impact of Modern Nanoscience/technology

2~5: Nano-Fabrication Technologies & Related Imaging Microscopy

6~8: Nano-Instrumentation/Characterization with Scanning Probe Microscopy

9~11: Nanomaterials and Nanostructures

12~13: Nano-Devices: Electronic, Photonic, Plasmonic, Electromechanical and Opto-mechanical.

14~16: Applications of Nanoscience/technology to Research Frontiers in Condensed Matter
